DOC.brief_summary: Measuring hemodynamic parameter ventilate patient important yet still complicate perform . Inert gas rebreathing ( IGR ) show promising result compare invasive well non-invasive technique measurement cardiac output . The aim study evaluate feasibility IGR ventilate patient .
DOC.criteria: age 18 80 year mechanically ventilate patient exist PiCCO arterial line FiO2 > 60 % ( fraction inspire oxygen ) PEEP > 10 mmHg ( positive endexpiratory pressure ) SO2 < 90 % ( oxygen saturation ) Systolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg Heart rate > 150 bpm APRV ( airway pressure release ventilation ) ICD ( implantable cardioverter defibrillator ) / pace maker [ Anaesthetic Conserving Device ( Anaconda ) ]
